ygData.subject: SV: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!
ygData.msgSnippet: What tests have you done to be able to state this? Me self did tests for about 3 months before i decided to roll over our laptops to ME since it s more stable
ygData.messageBody:
What tests have you done to be able to state this? Me self did tests for
about 3 months before i decided to roll over our laptops to ME since it's
more stable than 98 SE ever was.

I would rather check into drivers and applications before i start to blame
the OS.

However, not saying that ME is a worthy upgrade if you use Windows98 SE. But
we did notice a performance upgrade and alot of graphic heavy apps used less
resources. Not to mention the fact that ME will take use of more RAM than
W98 does.

-domi
-----Ursprungligt meddelande-----
Från: Su [mailto:suceress@...]
Skickat: den 12 december 2001 13:34
Till: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Ämne: Re: [EverQuest] I can't stinkin' log into Everquest!


If you can upgrade to Windows 98 you'd be better off. And yes, 98 is an
upgrade considering how unstable ME is.
luv,
-Su
